headline: Mayor invites Elon Musk and Twitter to relocate: Miami is a global city
author: Nathan Crooks
sentences:
We think what he is trying to accomplish with Twitter dovetails very nicely with the brand of the city of Miami.?
Suarez, who noted the citys growth in both tech-job creation and migration, said he hadnt yet talked to Musk about a potential move but pointed to other companies adding office space in the city, including Microsoft.

Suarez was asked at the conference about Floridas controversial dispute with Walt Disney Co., after the company criticized legislation signed by DeSantis that placed limits on grade school instruction about sexual orientation and gender identity.

And Im a Republican, Im not ashamed to say that.?
Suarez said that he hadnt talked to DeSantis in three years and that he regretted the loss of Kara Swishers Pivot conference in Miami because of the controversy.
Theres nobody in Sao Paulo or Paris, or, you know, or any other part of the world saying, Man, I cant wait to get on that plane to Austin, ? he said to widespread laughter.
At the same time, we have a thriving LGBTQ community here in Miami, and thats something that we also believe in nurturing,? he said.
Ron DeSantis said he wouldnt try to lure the company to the Sunshine State because it would increase living expenses for residents.
I think were on the cusp of getting something big, like, you know, Jeff Bezos moving here or Elon Musk moving here,? Suarez said.

I think Miami is a global city.?
Last month, the states finance chief advocated Twitter moving to Florida in a letter to Musk.
Miami Mayor Francis Suarez invited Twitter to move to the city amid Elon Musks $44 billion buyout of the social-media company.
Wed love to have Twitter here,? Suarez said Friday during an interview at a Bloomberg Power Players event in Miami.
Its part of our identity, like part of the diversity of our city is that we do have that, and we embrace that.
Right, and they affect people, they affect peoples lives, they affect peoples jobs,? he said.
The mayor said he thinks children should be learning about sexuality from their parents.
And I think thats something weve got to really be conscientious of.?
Suarez said there had also been talk about Apple and Cisco Systems.
I dont think they would argue that theyre an international city.
These ideological battles have real consequences.
Miami and Austin, Texas, are emerging tech hubs.
But to Suarez, theres no contest.
Its not an international city.
Gov.
